articles.description:
RT GUSTAVO
Tried out today FuelVM and SWAY by @fuellabs_ . 
Dev tooling is very much a work in progress but I liked the experience of using them so far.
Also enjoyed the tutorial put together by @camiinthisthang .
Here the code I created following it https://github.com/gustavoguimaraes/first-sway-contract

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Farza 🇺🇸 🇵🇰
Big news.
We've raised $10m led by a16z to build Hogwarts for the builders and dreamers.
It's a school for those who don't want to just "get a job" -- who want to instead pursue an alternative path.
We're profitable + have 125,000+ users.
Let's go 😈 https://buildspace.so/raise

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
The only real long-term solution is to make nodes participating in the protocol completely dumb to what is actually being processed. 
That’s actually how the internet already works.
By @calummoore ⛓️ https://blog.developerdao.com/ethereum-is-censoring-transactions#heading-the-road-to-better-censorship-resistance
